verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> when <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H834>after<s%> he had gone <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1339>Bathsheba.<s%> Have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> upon me, O <S%H430>God,<s%> according to thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness:<s%> according unto the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of thy tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> blot <S%H4229>out<s%> my <S%H6588>transgressions.<s%>
Wash <S%H3526><s%> me <S%H7235>throughly<s%> from mine <S%H4480>iniquity,<s%> <S%H5771><s%> and <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> me from my <S%H4480>sin.<s%> <S%H2403><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H3045>acknowledge<s%> my <S%H6588>transgressions:<s%> and my <S%H2403>sin<s%> is <S%H8548>ever<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> me.

Against thee, thee <S%H905>only,<s%> have I <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> and <S%H6213>done<s%> this <S%H7451>evil<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight:<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> thou mightest be <S%H6663>justified<s%> when thou <S%H1696>speakest,<s%> and be <S%H2135>clear<s%> when thou <S%H8199>judgest.<s%>
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I was <S%H2342>shapen<s%> in <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> and in <S%H2399>sin<s%> did my <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3179>conceive<s%> me.
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> thou <S%H2654>desirest<s%> <S%H571>truth<s%> in the inward <S%H2910>parts:<s%> and in the <S%H5640>hidden<s%> part thou shalt make me to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>
Purge <S%H2398><s%> me with <S%H231>hyssop,<s%> and I shall be <S%H2891>clean:<s%> <S%H3526>wash<s%> me, and I shall be <S%H3835>whiter<s%> than <S%H4480>snow.<s%> <S%H7950><s%>
Make me to <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H8342>joy<s%> and <S%H8057>gladness;<s%> that the <S%H6106>bones<s%> which thou hast <S%H1794>broken<s%> may <S%H1523>rejoice.<s%>
Hide <S%H5641><s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> from my <S%H4480>sins,<s%> <S%H2399><s%> and blot <S%H4229>out<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> mine <S%H5771>iniquities.<s%>
Create <S%H1254><s%> in me a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> O <S%H430>God;<s%> and <S%H2318>renew<s%> a <S%H3559>right<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> me.
Cast <S%H7993><s%> me <S%H408>not<s%> away from thy <S%H4480>presence;<s%> <S%H6440><s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me.
Restore <S%H7725><s%> unto me the <S%H8342>joy<s%> of thy <S%H3468>salvation;<s%> and <S%H5564>uphold<s%> me with thy <S%H5082>free<s%> <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>
Then will I <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H6586>transgressors<s%> thy <S%H1870>ways;<s%> and <S%H2400>sinners<s%> shall be <S%H7725>converted<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee.

Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me from <S%H4480>bloodguiltiness,<s%> <S%H1818><s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> thou <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H8668>salvation:<s%> and my <S%H3956>tongue<s%> shall sing <S%H7442>aloud<s%> of thy <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>
O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H6605>open<s%> thou my <S%H8193>lips;<s%> and my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall show <S%H5046>forth<s%> thy <S%H8416>praise.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H2654>desirest<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice;<s%> else would I <S%H5414>give<s%> it: thou <S%H7521>delightest<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> in burnt <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

The <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> are a <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H7307>spirit:<s%> a <S%H7665>broken<s%> and a <S%H1794>contrite<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> thou wilt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H959>despise.<s%>
Do <S%H3190>good<s%> in thy good <S%H7522>pleasure<s%> <S%H853>unto<s%> <S%H6726>Zion:<s%> <S%H1129>build<s%> thou the <S%H2346>walls<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> shalt thou be <S%H2654>pleased<s%> with the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> with burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and whole burnt <S%H3632>offering:<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> shall they <S%H5927>offer<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thine <S%H4196>altar.<s%>
